title: Elite: Dangerous Quick Rescore
desc: This is a short soundtrack rescore with a space theme featuring gameplay from Elite: Dangerous. The music was written in a few hours.

title: Westworld Scoring Competition
desc: For Spitfire Audio's 2020 Scoring Competition, I wrote this hybrid symphonic-electronic soundtrack to go along with a chase scene from Westworld.

title: Requiem
desc: Requiem (2020) is a symphonic piece based on Anna Akhmatova's work of the same name.

title: Journey
desc: Journey (2016) was my first release. There's a certain nostalgic appeal to the sound of the album. It has a cyberpunk feel with symphonic and other unusual instruments incorporated. The music is licensed for royalty-free use in games and other media.

title: To Dream
desc: To Dream (2016) features the longest song I've written, at 15 minutes. This song was written as a continuous story through many genres. It is the second of the three main albums I released in 2016.

title: Colossus
desc: Colossus (2016) is the darkest and final album of the three released in 2016. It features heavy strings and an overall melancholy feel.
